Name: Cuban Cocktail No. 2
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Faint sweetness balances spirituous rum notes in this delicately fruity, rose-red, bite-sized cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron 's 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide .
Nutrition: One serving of Cuban Cocktail No. 2 contains 133 calories
